name: Super & Hyper
description: Super & Hyper exercises to improve strength, flexibility, and endurance.

workout_groups.name: Superhero Strength & Power Mastery
workout_groups.description: Brutal strength training designed for extreme power outputâ€”lifting cars, smashing obstacles, and taking on massive forces.

workouts.name: Car Lift & Flip
workouts.description: Lift and flip a small car (~2,500 lbs) using raw lower-body and grip strength.

workouts.name: Meteor Punch Training
workouts.description: Strike reinforced steel blocks or impact-resistant bags to condition knuckles and maximize force output.

workouts.name: Giant Robot Grappling
workouts.description: Wrestle with a heavy, moving resistance dummy (~600 lbs) simulating combat against large opponents.

workouts.name: One-Arm Car Drag
workouts.description: Drag a full-sized vehicle (~3,000 lbs) using a single arm to simulate superhuman pulling strength.

workouts.name: Steel Beam Carry
workouts.description: Carry a long steel beam (~500 lbs) across a simulated battlefield, preparing for massive load-bearing feats.

workouts.name: Asteroid Destruction Punch
workouts.description: Perform full-force hammer punches on reinforced concrete blocks to simulate planetary-level destruction.

workouts.name: Titanic Deadlifts
workouts.description: Deadlift over **1,500 lbs** for max raw strength gains.

workouts.name: Shockwave Stomp
workouts.description: Leap and land with explosive force, creating a high-impact ground shockwave effect.

workouts.name: Superhero Landing Endurance
workouts.description: Drop from a **20+ foot height**, absorbing impact through controlled deceleration and tensed muscles.

workouts.name: Airplane Tow Sprint
workouts.description: Pull an aircraft (small private jet) using a full-body harness sprint for ultimate power conditioning.

workouts.name: Concrete Punching Power
workouts.description: Break concrete blocks using precision force to train impact durability.

workouts.name: Explosive Steel Door Smash
workouts.description: Charge into and break through reinforced steel doors using full-body kinetic force.

workouts.name: Weighted Hero Sprint
workouts.description: Sprint at **maximum speed** while carrying over **200+ lbs** on the shoulders.

workouts.name: Power Pole Vault Over Buildings
workouts.description: Vault over high obstacles (~15+ feet) using raw explosive leg power and pole-assisted propulsion.

workouts.name: Train Track Resisting Hold
workouts.description: Hold back a rolling heavy-weight sled (~1,000 lbs) for as long as possible to simulate stopping a train.

workouts.name: Super Speed Reaction Slams
workouts.description: React to random objects falling and slam them away before they hit the ground.

workouts.name: Catapult Toss
workouts.description: Throw a **300+ lb** object with explosive full-body strength.

workouts.name: Mega Jump Acceleration
workouts.description: Perform consecutive high jumps (~10+ feet) with rapid reloading in between.

workouts.name: Ground Pound Shockwave
workouts.description: Leap and smash both fists into the ground, maximizing force dispersion.

workouts.name: One-Arm Pole Hang with Weighted Suit
workouts.description: Hold onto a single bar or pole **with one arm** while carrying an additional **150+ lbs**.

workouts.name: Giant Chain Breakout
workouts.description: Break out of reinforced chains using **raw muscle power and tension control**.

workouts.name: Tectonic Plate Press
workouts.description: Perform maximum-effort leg presses with over **2,000+ lbs** for extreme power conditioning.

workouts.name: Human-Sized Boulder Toss
workouts.description: Lift and throw a **600+ lb** boulder over a **10-foot** barrier.

workouts.name: Titan Grip Hanging Hold
workouts.description: Hang from a moving structure (crane, helicopter, or shifting platform) while maintaining control.

workouts.name: Building Leap Training
workouts.description: Jump from one rooftop to another (~20 feet apart) with precise landing control.
